summary: Completed frontend testing of Al Taj Restaurant iteration 3 features: Homepage product images, Combos highlight, Raw Meat & Ready to Cook sections, Order page accordion menu, sticky nav, no floating download button, WhatsApp button, special category styling, and Login page social login buttons. All features working as expected.
critical_code_review_comments: Homepage product images correctly use customer-assets.emergentagent.com URLs for Chicken Biryani, Butter Chicken, and Tandoori Chicken
Combos section on homepage shows 3 combo cards (Family Feast, Couple Special, Solo Delight) with proper highlight styling
Raw Meat & Ready to Cook section on homepage has proper styling with icons and tag chips
Order page has NO floating download button in bottom-right (removed as requested)
WhatsApp button correctly positioned in bottom-left of order page
Sticky category navigation uses flex-wrap layout (no horizontal scrollbar)
Menu categories use accordion format - ALL collapsed by default
Clicking sticky nav button scrolls to and expands the category accordion
Raw Meat category has red/orange styling, Ready to Cook has amber styling, Combos has purple styling
Login page has Google and Facebook social login buttons in a 2-column grid layout
Google login button correctly redirects to auth.emergentagent.com (Emergent Auth)
Facebook login shows toast message since App ID isn't configured (expected behavior)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 3 UI features tested and working: 1) Homepage shows new product images from customer-assets.emergentagent.com, 2) Combos section highlighted with cards, 3) Raw Meat & Ready to Cook section with proper styling, 4) Order page accordion menu collapsed by default, 5) No floating download button in bottom-right, 6) WhatsApp button in bottom-left, 7) Sticky nav with flex-wrap (no scrollbar), 8) Special categories have color-coded styling (red for Raw Meat, amber for Ready to Cook, purple for Combos), 9) Google login redirects to Emergent Auth, 10) Facebook login shows toast (App ID not configured).

homepage_product_images.details: 3 signature dish images (Chicken Biryani, Butter Chicken, Tandoori Chicken) displaying correctly from customer-assets URLs

homepage_combos_highlight.details: Special Combos section visible with 3 combo cards (Family Feast, Couple Special, Solo Delight) and proper styling

homepage_rawmeat_section.details: Raw Meat & Ready to Cook section highlighted with gradient backgrounds, icons, and tag chips

order_page_no_floating_download_button.details: No floating download button found in bottom-right corner (removed as requested)

order_page_whatsapp_button.details: WhatsApp button present in bottom-left at x=24px

order_page_sticky_nav_no_scrollbar.details: Sticky category nav uses flex-wrap layout, categories displayed in wrapped grid format

order_page_accordion_collapsed_default.details: All 14 category accordions collapsed by default on page load

order_page_sticky_nav_scroll_expand.details: Clicking sticky nav button (e.g., Raw Meat) scrolls to and expands that category accordion

special_category_styling.details: Raw Meat has red styling, Ready to Cook has amber styling, Combos has purple styling - verified in both nav and accordions

login_google_button.details: Google login button present and redirects to auth.emergentagent.com

login_facebook_button.details: Facebook login button present (shows toast since App ID not configured - expected)
